Properties

Number opacity

Constructors

 DzOpacityManip (Number opacity=1.0)

Detailed Description

A manipulator that sets the alpha channel of an entire image layer to a specified value.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzOpacityManip::DzOpacityManip ( Number  opacity = 1.0  ) 

Default Constructor

Member Data Documentation

Number DzOpacityManip::opacity

The opacity value for the image. This should be in the range 0.0 - 1.0.
